root.name: SOL: Exodus
root.description: OverviewSOL: Exodus is a space-action sim delivered as a downloadable short format single player campaign. The developers plan to release additional campaigns as DLC. The game is running on the Unreal game engine.The story is that the sun is dying and mankind is in search for a new solar system to live in.Official WebsitePC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), or Windows 7Processor: 1.8Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon X2, or equivalentMemory: 2.0GBGraphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 256 MB of VRAM;(NVIDIA GeForce 7600 GS, ATI Radeon HD 2400 Pro 256 MB)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB availableSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bitRecommended:OS: Windows 7Processor: 2.0Ghz Quad CoreMemory: 4.0GBGraphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 512MB of VRAM; NVIDIA (GeForce GTX260 / ATI Radeon 4870)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB availableSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bit
